name: Challengeordrink
0:
”Alexa, play challenge or drink”
”Alexa, next question”
”Alexa, play again”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: challenge or drink
des:
This is an Alexa mediated drinking game. For the best experience, at least 5 people should play. 

To begin the game say "Alexa, play Challenge or drink" 
Alexa will then prompt you with the rules and the way to begin the game. 
To hear the rules at any point say "help".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
